alert.note: Alert for Northern Lancaster; Southern Lancaster (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 02 at 6:34AM EST by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A line of strong showers will impact portions of Fairfield, Lancaster and Newberry Counties through 730 AM EST... At 633 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Southwest Charlotte to near Cokesbury. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Newberry, Lancaster, Winnsboro, VC Summer Nuclear Station, Indian Land, Waxhaw, Whitmire, Elgin, Prosperity, Heath Springs, Jenkinsville, Andrew Jackson State Park, Monticello, Fairfield County Airport, USC Lancaster, Irwin, Newberry College, Blackstock, Van Wyck and Newberry County Airport. This includes the following highways... Interstate 26 between mile markers 62 and 88. Interstate 77 between mile markers 37 and 51. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
